md:
giải nghĩa từ "skates" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Skates (noun) : Ván trượt băng
	+ Meaning: A flat, narrow piece of wood or plastic with wheels, used for gliding on ice or a smooth surface.
	+ Example: She laced up her skates and stepped onto the ice.
	+ Related words: ice skates, roller skates, skateboarding.

* Skates (verb) : Trượt băng
	+ Meaning: To move on skates, especially on ice.
	+ Example: The kids skated around the rink, laughing and playing.
	+ Related words: skateboarding, ice skating, roller skating.

* Skates (plural noun) : Loài cá
	+ Meaning: A type of flat, bottom-dwelling fish, such as the skate or ray.
	+ Example: The aquarium had a variety of skates and other fish on display.
	+ Related words: ray, shark, fish.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "skates" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Skates (noun) : Ván trượt băng

    • Meaning: A flat, narrow piece of wood or plastic with wheels, used for gliding on ice or a smooth surface.
    • Example: She laced up her skates and stepped onto the ice.
    • Related words: ice skates, roller skates, skateboarding.

  • Skates (verb) : Trượt băng

    • Meaning: To move on skates, especially on ice.
    • Example: The kids skated around the rink, laughing and playing.
    • Related words: skateboarding, ice skating, roller skating.

  • Skates (plural noun) : Loài cá

    • Meaning: A type of flat, bottom-dwelling fish, such as the skate or ray.
    • Example: The aquarium had a variety of skates and other fish on display.
    • Related words: ray, shark, fish.
